attributes.action: Give home owners more rights to defend their property / themselves from burglars
attributes.additional_details: I think it would reduce the crime rate of burglaries massively all over the country if they knew that home owners could legally defend themselves without getting in to trouble. This would also reduce the stress on local police forces throughout the country who are constantly chasing thieves around towns trying to puzzle together evidence.
attributes.background: Home owners should have more rights to defend their property in the event of a burglary. Burglars know home owners can't defend themselves without risking getting in trouble and this is one big reason why they do it.

rejection.details:
The law already gives home owners the right to defend themselves and their property from burglars https://www.gov.uk/reasonable-force-against-intruders

You can submit a petition about specific changes to the law if that's what you'd like.
